original_text: To this day I have had the help that comes from God, and so I stand here testifying both to small and great, saying nothing but what the prophets and Moses said would come to pass:
korean_text: 하나님의 도우심을 받아 내가 오늘까지 서서 높고 낮은 사람 앞에서 증언하는 것은 선지자들과 모세가 반드시 되리라고 말한 것밖에 없으니

sentences.original_text: I have had the help that comes from God,
testifying both to small and great,
sentences.korean_translation: 작은 자나 큰 자나 모두에게 증언하며,

sentences.original_text: saying nothing but what the prophets and Moses said
sentences.korean_translation: 선지자들과 모세가 말한 것만 말하고 있습니다
